Posts.Content: I am 2 years out from original BC diagnosis.Mastec tomy on rgt breast. No chemo/radiation/loss of lymph nodes. I am exercising 5 times a week at gym and still experiencing back pain. I have modified back exercises as not to aggrevate the pain. What can I do to relieve some of this pain? Any suggestions please. BrendaC
Posts.Title: Back pain from anastrozole
